attributes.action: General election in 2017 so an elected PM will deal with 'Brexit' negotiations.
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May should be ashamed that she would rather cling on to power instead of doing the right thing and having an elected PM be dealing with these negotiations.
attributes.background: Theresa May's decision to pull the UK out of the single market is a drastic one. Although the UK did indeed vote to leave the EU they did not vote what that would entail (i.e. if would remain part of the single market). A non-elected Prime Minister should not be making these decisions.
